tasks.title: Create StatsModel for metrics aggregation
tasks.description: Add a model to aggregate log data into displayable statistics. Create SessionStats model with: transcriptionCount, successRate, avgResponseTime, overflowCount, noSpeechCount. Parse log files to calculate metrics for current day.
acceptance_criteria: Create SessionStats model with required fields
Model can be populated from parsed log data

tasks.title: Add StatsService to watch and parse logs
tasks.description: Service that reads brabble logs and calculates current stats. Create StatsService that watches log files, calculates metrics matching claudio-report.sh logic, and updates stats when logs change.
acceptance_criteria: Calculates metrics: transcription count, success rate, overflow count
Calculates average response time from timestamp pairs
Updates when logs change using file system watcher

tasks.title: Add StatsView UI component
tasks.description: SwiftUI view showing statistics and health indicator. Display key metrics and show health indicator dot (green/yellow/red) based on success rate.
acceptance_criteria: Display metrics: transcriptions, success rate, response time, overflow count
Show health indicator: green (>90%), yellow (70-90%), red (<70%)
Consistent styling with existing Claudio views

tasks.title: Integrate StatsView into menu dropdown
tasks.description: Add stats section to main menu bar dropdown. Stats visible and updates in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Stats section visible in menu dropdown
